page.title: 16Housing
page.content: Housing consists of isolated farmhouses with the exception of the settlement of Cilfynydd.The terraced houseing found here was largely built in the 1890's by the coal owner.Houses face eack other across streets,each street stretching along and up the sides of the valley.The typical house has a slate roof,3 bedrooms,a lounge ,living area and kitchen.In recent years the government has given grants to help bring these houses up to the standards required for the 1980's! A sample of 21 houses in local community showed the following:- 1)16 are owned or purchased by the occupiers 2)12 are centrally heated 3)14 use gas,6 coal and 2 electricity to heat their homes 4)18 have made major improvements to their homes in the last 20 years.
